notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription:
If <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p</annotation></semantics></math> represents the logical statement, “Marigolds are yellow flowers,” then ______ represents the statement, “Marigolds are not yellow flowers.”
